a.title: Arial View of Rush City Schools

img.alt: Arial View of Rush City Schools

br.strong: A Small School District Surrounded by a Big Hearted Community

p.span: We are so fortunate to be able to offer the young people we serve
of learning opportunities! Beginning with our purpose-built
students, all the way to the newly implemented 1:1 Chrome book learning initiative at our High School, we are focused on ensuring each student reaches his or her
Options for concurrent college courses continue to expand, foundational skill development is solid,
performing and visual arts are strongly supported, our sports teams compete on some of the most amazing fields and courts, and we enjoy extremely high levels of student participation.

div.h2: What's New at Rush City Schools?

br.br:
School staff, parents and students may have questions or concerns about coronavirus, now called coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19). The Minnestota Department of Health (MDH) is closely monitoring the situation.

br.p: Listen to WCCO radio (830 AM), WCMP radio (1350 AM & 100.9 FM), KBEK radio (95.5 FM) or watch KARE TV, KSTP TV and WCCO TV for school closing/weather emergency information. Notices will also be posted here on our website.
